tasks.name: fulfillment_courier
tasks.mutation: mutation { fulfillment { fulfillment_courier { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0,  mode: UPSERT } ) { details{ items {status {id, code, message} }, operationStatus { code message } } } } } }

tasks.name: fulfillment_product
tasks.mutation: mutation { fulfillment { fulfillment_product { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0,  mode: UPSERT } ) { details{ items {status {id, code, message} }, operationStatus { code message } } } } } }
